message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.SY, cs.DS 

This paper discusses reinforcement learning algorithms and their application to complicated and realistic tasks. This topic falls under the broad category of machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also introduces a mathematical model that integrates risk-averse and risk-prone attitudes, which is related to the field of neural networks and evolutionary computation (cs.NE). The focus on a satisficing strategy and the analysis of regret also suggest a connection to control systems (cs.SY) and data structures and algorithms (cs.DS).
